title: VHoppAS: Variable-range Hopping in Amorphous Solids
description: Kinetic Monte-Carlo simulation of 3D variable-range hopping of localized electrons in amorphous compounds, which yields the conductivity (and diffusion coefficients) based on a user-supplied density of states (e.g. from an ab-initio DOS).
